website_summaries.verdict: The outstanding toughness and durability allow this model to withstand multiple weather conditions and high traffic areas, making it a good option for business doorways or office building entryways.
pros: Tough rubber material will withstand rainstorms without puddling
Will not get brittle in high temperatures like some outdoor mats
Hard enough to take a pounding, and will not wear out quickly even in areas with above-average foot traffic
Ribbed design ensures no tracking of dirt
Rubber material cleans easily with a hose or broom
cons: Some users report a tendency for the corners of this model to curl slightly with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: New version is low quality.  They don't make them like they used to!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these March 2018 and the quality is nice. It's thick and durable. It weighs 6 lbs 3 ounces. I purchased another August 2019 and the quality is poor. I've only had it 3 weeks and it's already cracking. This mat is a lot thinner and not nearly as durable. It weighs 4 lbs 15 ounces. It's over one pound lighter. It looks like the knobbies are the same height but the mat is thinner. Cracking after only 3 weeks! I think the majority of the reviews are for the older, higher quality version.
customer_reviews.author: Flux Capacitor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Porch ...
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this sooner? We are using this on the back porch. I love that if it gets mucked up, I can just pull it onto the lawn and hose it off. When the snow falls, I can just grab it and shake the snow off ... even easier than shoveling. I'd ordered a smaller/heavier mat, and realized I needed something larger. This is thinner, but I like it just as well.
customer_reviews.author: *BlackhamBunch*

customer_reviews.title: I really like the fact that it can be hosed off or ...
customer_reviews.text: This rug is superb at collecting sand and debris! I have it in my home at the entry to my kitchen in the mudroom. I really like the fact that it can be hosed off or even scrubbed if we experience mud. I vacuumed it for the first time and everything came up well! I would like a larger sized one though. It'd be a great addition to my mudroom! It gets tough trying to keep your house clean when you're farmers. Coming in with muddy and sand boots from living on a dirt road can really be a hot mess.
customer_reviews.author: Serah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mud
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect for rainy days. It gets muddy ground at our office entrance when it rains. We wipe our shoes on it before we get in our office and it takes almost all the dirt off from shoes so we don't drag it to our brand new carpets. Easy to clean, we wash it regularly with a garden hose. It is heavier than I expected but it should be a good sign. It doesn't move in place and feels heavy duty. That's exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my intended use of keeping just outside the entrance of a tent. Very well made, thick enough to do the job yet supple enough to roll back up and put away until the next time. Has a slight rubber smell, but nothing like that awful, nasty odor of the rubber coming out of China these days.
customer_reviews.author: CopOut

customer_reviews.title: easy to vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I use this in front of my cat's litter box, to reduce tracking of litter. It is very effective, easy to vacuum. If I need to clean it more thoroughly, it can be taken out into the yard and sprayed with a hose and scrubbed down if necessary. It does not slide around on my tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: ... live on a cattle ranch and these mats work great at keeping most of the dirt outside
customer_reviews.text: I live on a cattle ranch and these mats work great at keeping most of the dirt outside. Very affordable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It is harder than you think to find a doormat that isn't rug material in the store. Living in the Northeast in winter you need a rubber mat. Our last one finally died and it took forever to find one. Here I got to choose the size I wanted as well. We have used it through multiple storms and are very satisfied with it. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that I wished the rubber that sticks up to help clean off your shoes was a little deeper than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep ice off vehicles windshield
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my windshield under the wipers to prevent freezing rain and thick ice layer from building up. We get over 1⁄8” thick ice here every Winter. Scraping the windshield is brutal. Just lift the doormat and windshield is cleared. Thick, heavy duty rubber.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels like a car mat
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels like a car mat. Sturdy and high quality material. Definitely non-slip . Easy to wash or wipe. We use it to remove our shoes on as we get inside the house and for that purpose it is perfect. With a price tag less than $11 it is pretty reasonable too... I bought two of them and have used them for a few weeks with no complaints. I will update the review if the long term durability does not satisfy me.
customer_reviews.author: Muttley

customer_reviews.title: It's nicely made an it's sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's nicely made an it's sturdy. However, it was rolled with the top of the mat rolled inward. In other words when I unrolled it, it was curled up. So I placed it top side down until it straightened out. It's OK now. Otherwise someone could have tripped over the ends sticking up.
customer_reviews.author: Eva M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a rubber doormat to catch all the dirt and sand that being tracked into my kitchen from the garage when I found this. It works great! the sand gets left right on the doormat where it belongs rather than tracked all over my house! The only negative thing I have to say is that this rubber doormat smelled HORRIBLE when I took it out of the package for the first 24 hours, to the point where my toddler didn't even want to be in the kitchen! I recommend airing it out, and being aware of the initial horrible rubber smell. Other than that it's been great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mat
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Nice rubber mat, catch all the dirt and sand here in Florida and I can take it out and shake or hose it off. Good quality rubber. I noticed a lot of people say dimensions weren’t correct, but mine measured 35.5”x 24”. It was not completely flat when I measured it because it was rolled up when delivered, so I think when it is completely flat it will measure 36” length. Good mat for the money, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: superrgf

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best rubber mats on amazon
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. Super thick, barely a rubber smell when you unpack it that doesn't disrupt the smell of your house and goes away once it breathes for a few hours. and they fold flat beautifully. I own 3 of these now and will always be grabbing these when a mat is needed. For the price, you can't argue at all. I have one for each entryway door and even the smaller one for under the water bowl for the pets because one of my dogs likes squirting water out of her mouth everytime she drinks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Skc

customer_reviews.title: Good for Muddy, Icy Weather
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put outside a door with concrete outside and rug on the inside. The measurements were just right for what I needed. While mud was still occasionally tracked in, this mat helped reduce the amount of mud and debris. It was also good at stopping the concrete floor getting too icy and slippery. It's usually easy to clean by picking it up, shaking it off, and letting it dry out before putting it back down.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC value!
customer_reviews.text: I know own 7 of these. They are incredible for this price! Thick, heavy and stay in place. I have them at all outside doors an in our mudroom and inside where my dog comes in. Also one under our litterbox - traps litter and dirt and is easy to vacuum with the hose. These catch SO much dirt that would otherwise be tracked into my house. So easy to clean also. Highly durable. GREAT value.
customer_reviews.author: MDT00

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is nice and heavy duty and works perfectly for our house because of our pets. It stays in one place, and the dog hair doesn’t stick to the mat. I’ve bought several mats in the last year, and they end up covered in dog hair that WON’T come off.
customer_reviews.author: Tami81

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for what it is, an outdoor rubber mat. The tread on it is a nice touch if using it for a door entrance. I use mine a bit differently. I place my outdoor umbrella on it to reduce scratches from the umbrella stand on the deck. I'd order this one again.
customer_reviews.author: dfbjumps

customer_reviews.title: Noise buffer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to buffer the sound and vibration of my washing machine, and as not to disturb the downstairs neighbor. Well, she doesn't even know when I'm using the machine, so mission accomplished! I like that I it's durable, because I roll my 75 lb washing machine on and off this at least two to three times a week, and it's holding up. I just rinse it off every now and then, let it dry, and then roll it up and stick it in the corner by the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Na'kima

customer_reviews.title: Best at trapping and keeping dirt out!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases we made for our new house! We live with red dirt which is awful to keep out of our house. With pets and kids in and out other mats just got heavier and full of dirt but had to be thrown out because we didn’t get to reuse them effectively. This may collects dirt and mud, is so easy to rinse off,and place back. We are planning to purchase another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V

customer_reviews.title: Smells - not for indoor use.
customer_reviews.text: This is not indoor/outdoor as described. It smells so strong there is no way that this could be used inside. Have had it "airing out" outside for almost a week and it still reeks. I can't even have it on my patio because it smells that bad. It was returned : /
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Works well collecting outside 'stuff' from the dog...
customer_reviews.text: Placed it at the back door where the dog enters/exits....does a good job of cleaning the dogs pads when she comes in from outside..the cleats do the job....
customer_reviews.author: R. Schunk

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are great and a great buy. No issues with unrolling and they lay flat after a few minutes out of the box. Using them at the front and back door and so far they have worked. It's an object that will hold up to hard use and collects mud.
customer_reviews.author: Literature Affiliated

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty rubber
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy duty rubber mat. Good value for the price. Heavy enough that it will stay in place and not slip around like some of those light weight matts you see in the discount stores. Should get many years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin, low equality, incorrect length
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. It’s paper thin, 1 of 2 arrived with a tear so you can imagine how long it will last. Mine also measures 35” long, not 36”, which is a problem for the space I need to cover from rain. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love tis, keeps me fromtracking in the house!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sturdy mat, thick and with little groves on the pieces that stick up so there is plenty of surface to really clean the bottom of shoes, and it does not appear to hurt my old dogs feet. Love it and will order another when this one wears out...if it ever does!
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Mccombs

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: Good size, heavy with deep treads good for wiping the bottoms of shoes/boots with. I expect this should last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Elky

customer_reviews.title: Great Job
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and well made. It laid flat as soon as I unwrapped it, and has not moved during rainy windy night.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: top notch cat litter mat
customer_reviews.text: great for cat litter. traction design allows for capture and easy release of litter granules.
customer_reviews.author: jayl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, and it absolutely perfect! Clean shoes very good and easy! Looks sturdy, easy to clean. Perfect size for my outside patio door. Probably will order small pkasments for front doors as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Agee

customer_reviews.title: Large mat, perfect for keeping your floor dry
customer_reviews.text: We use this mat outside of our cat litter box. If he misses the box, it stays contained in the ridges of the mat instead of running all over our crooked old hardwood floors. Would keep rain and snow contained as well.
customer_reviews.author: RBV

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks great. Very durable and price fair. I bought a couple for my other properties as well because I liked it so much. Cleans up nicely. Shipped in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the doormat we were using for our RV that was trapping dirt and hair. This mat is perfect, it does not trap anything...easy to keep clean. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: le.breeze

customer_reviews.title: Just what kitty needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to put under our cat’s litter box. Has reduced the spread of loose litter better than other products designed specifically for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: André DeVine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This rug is more than what I was looking for . It is as described...but better. I would definitely buy any product this company sells.
customer_reviews.author: Dreena Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Cat Litter mat
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something that helps with the cat litter!! It is easy to clean. Heavy enough that it doesn't slide anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Functional and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Put out in front of the motorhome door. Collects a good portion of the dust and dirt from everyone's shoes before they enter the motorhome. I just shake it off and vacuum as needed.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several of these! We like them - have 2 boys and a husband that are always outside in the dirt !!
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very thick outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: Outdoor rug is sturdy, heavy and thick. Perfect for outside of our basement sliding glass door. Cheaper than I could find at other stores as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Smaller mats than what I expected (I bought both of the larger sizes that it comes in). However , it does seem to hold up well (besides for dogs ... our three dogs chewed up the one of them in a period of a couple hours) but other than that, this may does not slip or move on carpet or tile and of course the black looks great as it goes with anything . These mats are also very easy to vacuum up nd clean off / clean up
customer_reviews.author: Jmg

customer_reviews.title: Tore immediately
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable. Tore immediately out of the package. Not a strong utility mat at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Purchased For Water Dispenser Mat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item. It's heavy and durable and fits perfect underneath my water dispenser to keep water from landing on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: James Carson

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat for my front door, but after only a few days off 100-103 heat several pieces came right off the center of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: MissKukla

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with doormat - heavy enough to avoid being blown away by strong winds. Appears to be very durable and should last for years. Would buy again. Only complaint is that it was wrapped in plastic and shipped that way - not in a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Proud to Speak English

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rubber mats
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality rubber mats for what you pay. I put these outside so you can wipe off mud, dirt, or snow and then have cloth ones inside to keep those more clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin

customer_reviews.title: Door mat
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great idea, nice to look at. The only issue I have, when it rains, it really fills up with water. I find myself draining it quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It is effective! I gave it a four star on easy to clean as it requires hose / power wash to get it thoroughly clean. It does not lessen all its other attributes!
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Helene Langevin

customer_reviews.title: Great mat.
customer_reviews.text: This is second one I’ve ordered because they are nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan_L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this a decade ago!! This is so much better than any fabric rug. I can hose it off outside and it works great! I have 2 inside at both entry doors.
customer_reviews.author: boboswife

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with my space. I use it inside my house for keeping my shoe away from the sun.. good quality of rubber and not slip on tile .
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Had the unconventional idea to use it as a bath mat, and love it. The treading is like wearing those soccer slides on my feet, water dries no problem and it’s a dream to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2x3... It's perfect for the front door and seems extremely durable. Effective shoe wiper and easy to clean off!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted from garage to inside
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, great for garage to inside or even would be great outside or mud room. Haven’t sprayed it down to clean it yet but it’s quality rubber.
customer_reviews.author: kld241

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It came torn in the corner but not so badly I will return it or request a refund. For the price it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a low cost mat and fully met my expectations. It seems sturdy and meets the need fine.
customer_reviews.author: Margo or Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good for commercial use
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought it would have the rubber spines on it. It is a good product if you have a business or if you’re yawing it for your pets to walk on before coming in the house
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gallucci

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mat for my front door! Great size and quality!! I just ordered another one to use for my dogs bowls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back Porch
customer_reviews.text: This is my back door rug but I think I am going to get a bigger one and place this one right in front of the door.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Serves the purpose of keeping the house clean. Easy to vacuum out solid dirt and can be washed to remove any oily patches. Be aware of the peculiar smell of the new mat, but it goes away within the first week of usage.
customer_reviews.author: suman hosmane

customer_reviews.title: Like commercial quality/love 'em
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky and an experienced shopper. Spent hrs researching rubber mats. Like commercial quality. To me, these are easier to clean than fibers, just broom off. I'm totally satisfied. I have 2 at my front door and love to stand on the cushy but sturdy mats. These are the lowest price for the quality and I'm sure they'll last for 10 years. Buy these for sure. Peace!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, lays flat, holds dirt, grass, and water.
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks good. It laid flat right away after unrolling it. The tread holds grass and dirt. And, water does not go through it. It works very nicely in our breezeway.
customer_reviews.author: Felix D.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for under cats litter box. Works awesome, easily vacuumed over and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl78

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: About to order two more for the other entrances to the house. Easy to clean. Saving my inside rug. Love this mat!
customer_reviews.author: Mickeym

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got the medium size to go on our back deck. Was quite a bit bigger than expected. We’ve been using to 2 months now and it seems to be holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entrance mat
customer_reviews.text: It was alittle bit curly at the end but it went away in a day or two by stepping on it very easy to clean very durable for the price, decent size
customer_reviews.author: Sigurdur Sigthorsson

customer_reviews.title: My Ottomanson rubber door mat
customer_reviews.text: This rubber mat is great even for the use I used it for. I park my mobility cart on it in the kitchen of my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence mueller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Easy to Clean, Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, Easy to Clean, Stays Put. Odor went away after a few days outdoors.

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor mat
customer_reviews.text: Good solid mat for outdoor use. Easy to clean with the hose.

customer_reviews.title: Rubber material for the patio is perfect for all weather and wear
customer_reviews.text: Rubber material for the patio is perfect for all weather and wear. I would highly recommend this product. The size was perfect and it arrived as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Strongly made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made 3 star for light weight because thick and durable not because it was cheaply made A+

customer_reviews.title: Imposter!
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered was not the item pictured. I returned it.

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, Well made - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect, well crafted and easy to clean. Can not go wrong with the price - and nice size.

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well.
customer_reviews.text: Great pattern for wiping shoes, and holding water. I use them outside the main entrance and they work great.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly to the front door and look great
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time. I like the texture and how durable it is. It fit perfectly to my front door. The price is cheaper compare to other similar item.
customer_reviews.author: Bungheng

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my garage I like it and I would buy another

customer_reviews.title: looks great and is very durable
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture and is perfect for my entrance from the garage

customer_reviews.title: Great winter shoe mat.
customer_reviews.text: Great door mat. Traps dirt and winter salt just like I wanted. If I was being pickey I'd say it's a touch thin but I do not need it to be thick.

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and long lasting. I bought two (front and back doors) and they are great products.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy girl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: As expected! I run over it with my vacuum on the high pile setting to clean. It’s great!

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy, but doest the job.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but does the job! It's definitely helped prevent dirt and grass from getting into the house. Very simple to clean.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my Husband’s Barber Shop and he loves them!! Delivered Quickly and Sturdy!!

customer_reviews.title: Since it is made of natural rubber, it is durable and takes care of the purpose quite well.
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. I use it as the outside door mat, at the front door of my house.

customer_reviews.text: Laid flat right out of the bix. Heavy rubber but flexible.

customer_reviews.text: Super durable, easy to clean. When you "scuff" it can even get most of the pebble off the shoes.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put under my cat litter box. It works just great.

customer_reviews.text: not the most aesthetically pleasing but the size alone and price reeled me in. not flimsy, stays put. large sized.
customer_reviews.author: momof1baby1manbaby3dogs

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! I hated when all the dog fur would get caught on the previous one. This one doesn't have such a problem and it's much easier to clean off! Thinking about ordering one for the front door. I haven't had problems with the ends curling up. They did for a little bit, but perhaps sitting it outside helped it.

customer_reviews.title: Nice outside mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice outdoor mat and is not like tigers I have that looks the little spikes in the mat.

customer_reviews.text: It's very nice and keeps all the dirt out of my apartment. The studs clean your shoes quite nicely.

customer_reviews.text: It's a rug. It lays there and if you rub your feet on it, dirt comes off. Solid system.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pad.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sturdy pad for the money. Especially if you have pets.
